data.question: What is the chemical formula of PCN-602(Ni)?
What is the BET surface area of PCN-602(Ni)?
At what temperature does PCN-602(Mn) begin to decompose?
What is the yield of chlorocyclohexane when catalyzed by PCN-602(Mn) under optimized conditions?
Is PCN-602(Ni) stable in 1 M KF aqueous solution?
Does the Soret band of PCN-602(Mn) change from 475 nm to 435 nm upon addition of 0.33 M NaClO?
What is the main reason for the higher catalytic activity of PCN-602(Mn) compared to its homogeneous counterpart?
data.answer: The rigid framework structure of PCN-602(Mn) prevents the formation of catalytically inactive dimers.

data.question: Can PCN-602(Mn) be reused for catalysis after recovery?
What is the yield of chlorocyclopentane when catalyzed by PCN-602(Mn)?
What happens to the Soret band of PCN-602(Mn) when cyclopentane is added to the mixture containing 0.33 M NaClO?
data.answer: It changes gradually from 435 nm to 475 nm.

data.question: Is PCN-602(Mn) stable in 1 M Na2CO3 aqueous solution?
What is the chemical formula of PCN-602(Mn)?
What solvent is used for the chlorination of cyclohexane under optimized conditions?
Does PCN-602(Mn) show a BET surface area of 1969 m2/g?
What is the yield of bromocyclohexane when catalyzed by PCN-602(Mn)?
Does the UV-vis spectral change observed for the chlorination of cyclopentane catalyzed by PCN-602(Mn) indicate a Mn redox state change?
Is PCN-602(Mn) stable in 1 M K3PO4 aqueous solution?
What is the yield of bromocyclopentane when catalyzed by PCN-602(Mn)?
Can PCN-602(Mn) catalyze the chlorination of cyclopentane under the same conditions as cyclohexane?
What is the role of NaOCl in the catalytic reaction of PCN-602(Mn)?
data.answer: It oxidizes the starting MnIII porphyrin to a dioxo- or oxohydroxo MnV complex.
